description:
Seiya, Shun and Shiryu cautiously enter the house of Virgo, and confront a closed-eyed Shaka. In tum, they each attack Shaka, but it is of no use. Shaka`s power is the greatest they have yet to face: the force that they use to attack him with is simply returned upon them tenfold. Shaka mocks them for their weakness and is angered because he realizes that the only way they could have made it this far is by the betrayal of the gold saints in the houses beneath him. Just as Shaka prepares to kill the bronze saints, in walks Phoenix to save the day…or does he? Shaka gives Phoenix a choice: either he Gan die, or get down on his knees and accept Shaka as his god, Budda. Phoenix mocks the crazy gold saint for believing that he is the reincarnation of Budda, and chooses to die rather than kneel in front of such an evil saint. True to his word, Shaka attacks Phoenix with his Herculean powers. Shaka shows Phoenix the six worlds of the dead and asks him to choose the one in which he would like to live after he is dead.
